lead_paragraph: It was never true. Any of it. And even as Mr. Trump surrendered to the reality of President Obama’s birthplace, he insisted on conjuring a new falsehood.

headline.print_headline: Trump Gives Up a Lie but Refuses to Repent
headline.main: Donald Trump Clung to ‘Birther’ Lie for Years, and Still Isn’t Apologetic

snippet: It was never true. Any of it. And even as Mr. Trump surrendered to the reality of President Obama’s birthplace, he insisted on conjuring a new falsehood....
abstract: News Analysis; Donald J Trump, after five years of nurturing 'birther' issue to undermine Pres Obama, finally admits president was born in United States, but offers no apology or repentance;  Trump perpetuated falsehood in relentless effort to challenge legitimacy of nation's first black president without credible evidence of any kind, baffling and embarrassing many around him.
